definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
brokerage/a commission paid to a middleman/euphemism for a bribe/a kickback
to detain/to hold in custody/to distrain/to seize property
to give a discount/to be of less value than anticipated

sentences.english: At last, suggestions for improving the makeup reliability of PSC connection are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 對關於提高PSC接頭上扣可靠性問題提出幾點建議。

sentences.english: All right. Let me help you button your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 好，我來幫你扣襯衫釦子。

sentences.english: Papers that are late will be penalized by one-third of a letter grade for each day late.
sentences.chinese: 報告遲交，每遲交一天將扣字母三分之一級。

sentences.english: Double-breasted suit jackets should always have peak lapels.
sentences.chinese: 雙排扣男西裝夾克應該是峯狀翻領。

sentences.english: Police booted the car with unpaid fines.
sentences.chinese: 警察給那輛不繳罰款的汽車扣上車輪鎖。

sentences.english: Need a one-time deduction of 12 points contact me.
sentences.chinese: 需要一次性扣12分的聯繫我。

sentences.english: Carrie had thought of going for a walk, and had put on a light grey woollen dress with a jaunty double-breasted jacket.
sentences.chinese: 她已穿上淡灰羊毛女裝，外罩一件時髦的雙排扣上裝。
任何時候均扣上安全帶。

sentences.english: He hasped the door and asked me where I came from.
sentences.chinese: 他扣上門，問我是從哪兒來的。

sentences.english: Remove the film, connect the electrical wire to the electrode with the clip.
sentences.chinese: 將防粘膜撕開，用導電線夾頭與電極金屬扣聯接。
“RL瑞龍”，壓花閃閃發光的金屬單管齊馬鐙扣。

sentences.english: Steal other accounts, forty-eighth of each deduction.
sentences.chinese: 盜用他人賬戶的，每次扣四十八分。

sentences.english: Methods 42 cases of rhegmatogenous retinal detachment had undergone scleral bulking surgery.
sentences.chinese: 方法42例孔源性非增生性視網膜脫離行鞏膜扣帶術。

sentences.english: if this was suicide, how did she reach the trigger?
sentences.chinese: 如果這是自殺的話她怎麼扣到板機的？
許多男式職業裝都是雙排扣的。

definition: to deduct marks (when grading school work)/to have marks deducted/penalty points/to lose points for a penalty or error
to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
